text: is a Japanese football player for Ventforet Kofu. ==Career== After rising through the Ventforet Kofu youth ranks and attending Nippon Sport Science University, Ota rejoined the club in 2018. ==Club statistics== Updated to 29 August 2018.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 156 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | League Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
